Text: I'm not complaining, but, why the rars? Just curiosity. (:

@deadxgirl
Its cause it makes the file that you download smaller.

@Sxckient: Not with enough to be worth it when we are talking already highly compressed video/audio-material. The reason there are .RARs on torrent-sites are mostly because people don't bother unraring de original releases before uploading. Now, why the original releases are .RAR:ed I consider to be historic reasons, but others say it still matters for easier errorcorrecting and site-racing. bla bla bla bla. .
